item.title: When Buying Life Insurance, Avoid These Little-Known Mistakes
item.description: Three things that could prevent you from getting the best policy for the money or your needs.

item.title: Vet Bills Are Rising. Will Pet Insurance Save You Money?
item.description: The answer depends largely on the kind of pet parent you are.

item.title: $1,000 Annual Fees on Premium Credit Cards Could Soon Be the New Normal
item.description: There are several reasons card issuers are hiking fees right now, and they all have to do with benefits.

item.title: Dollar Scholar Asks: Is Buying a Timeshare a Good Investment?
item.description: Timeshares are becoming cool again, with expanded destinations and easy-to-use points systems. But does buying one actually make financial sense?

item.title: How to Balance Work Earnings and Other Income in Retirement
item.description: Getting the right mix can maximize the money you have available in retirement, and the total taxes you pay on it.
